description.value:
Your psychic abilities bolster your mental defenses, and you can extend that strength to nearby allies.
Prerequisites: Limited telepathy or telepathy.

Benefit: You gain a +2 insight bonus to saving throws against @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting} effects. Once per day as a reaction, you can grant allies within range of your telepathic communication a +2 insight bonus to saving throws against @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.PqV3OCbUTyk2upPD]{Mind-affecting} effects until the end of your next turn.

activation.condition: Ally rolls a saving throw against against mind-affecting effects.

duration.value: Until the end of your next turn.

modifiers.name: Soothing Telepathy
modifiers.notes: Bonus to saving throws against mind-affecting effects.
